sentences: Anthony Cuthbert Baines (1912–1997)  was an English organologist who produced a wide variety of works on the history of musical instruments, and was a founding member of the Galpin Society.
He attended Westminster School and then read for a degree in chemistry at Christ Church, Oxford.
Bagpipes (Oxford: Oxford University Press, 1960; reprinted 1979, 1995), ISBN 0-902793-10-1
Jeremy Montagu: "Anthony Baines, 1912–97", in Early Music vol. 25 (1997), May, pp.
Joan Rimmer: "Anthony Cuthbert Baines, 1912–1997: A Biographical Memoir", in: The Galpin Society Journal vol.
